mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_PFF_CHRG_LOG_DTL(PFF_CHRG_LOG_DTL_ID, PFF_CHRG_LOG_ID, TXN_DATE, CHRG_AMT, CHRWV_AMT, CHRWV_MTD_CDE, IS_WAIVE, PROFO_VAL, CHRG_GRP_VID, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.pffChrgLogDtlId},#{item.pffChrgLogId},#{item.txnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.chrgAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.chrwvAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.chrwvMtdCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.isWaive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.profoVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{item.chrgGrpVid,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
